recipe.name: quick beef stir-fry
recipe.description: a simple and delicious beef stir-fry recipe with a hint of ginger and chinese five spice.

ingredients.name: ginger root
ingredients.quantity: about the size of the tip of my thumb, peeled and sliced thinly

steps.description: heat the minced garlic and half of the onion in the pan before adding the beef, gives a great flavor.
add the beef to the pan and cook until browned.
add the broccoli, green peppers, and ginger root to the pan. stir-fry for 2-3 minutes or until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
season with salt, pepper, and chinese five spice to taste.
